name: Homing Egg ALPHA
description:
An early version of a little game I am working on. Right now my plan is to release new versions here up until I feel it is good enough to publish on newgrounds.

CURRENT VERSION: Alpha 1.0

Welcome to Homing Egg! The eggs are coming after you, shooting from a cannon, and the worst part; they're EGGsplosive (i am very sorry)

HOW TO PLAY:

Run from the eggs using the arrow keys

Jump over the eggs using Z (or space if you want to look like an idiot hahaahahhahhaa)

Click to navigate menus

If the egg touches the ground, it gets obliterated from the universe. Use this to your advantage!

PLANNED UPDATES:

An actual functional shop

Different gamemodes(?)

Difficulty selection

Skins that give you perks (but also take away some things. For example I have plans for a hat skin that makes your hitbox larger but you get double points.)

Maybe multiplayer

Better visuals

(ALL OF THESE UPDATES ARE SUBJECT TO JUST NOT HAPPENING)

Credits:

actually i made all the music and everything but also thank you to the people in the Gdevelop discord server for tips on actually coding the game...
